name: DolarApp
long_description:
DolarApp provides access to U.S. Financial Services to affluent consumers in Latin America: local and international transfers, transparent exchange rates, savings in digital dollars, investment in US stocks & ETFs, and international payments with a credit card – without hidden fees.

DolarApp was started by Alvaro, Zach and Fernando, who worked together at Revolut. They are all engineers by background, and they all started their careers in consulting.
one_liner: The Financial App for affluent consumers in Latin America.
